thread.title: Yuvika Chaudhary: Will not create unnecessary controversy on 'Bigg Boss 9'
thread.title_full: Yuvika Chaudhary: Will not create unnecessary controversy on 'Bigg Boss 9' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Yuvika Chaudhary: Will not create unnecessary controversy on 'Bigg Boss 9'
text:
Actress Yuvika Chaudhary says she will not rake up unnecessary controversies to get footage in the " Bigg Boss " house.*Yuvika Chaudhary *
Yuvika, who is among the 14 people participating in the ninth season of "Bigg Boss", said she is a very homely girl and saying yes to the show was very difficult.
"I am a very homely girl. ... Â»
